entry.title: Friday: A few flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Rain showers early this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 1.
